article_title: Iran To Discuss Its Nuclear Program With U.S. Officials
article_text:
Iranian President Hassan Rouhani tells The Washington Post he wants a deal on Iran’s nuclear program within six months.

This comes before meetings today that will feature Secretary of State John Kerry and Iran’s foreign secretary.

But Rouhani also sparked outrage in Iran when he appeared to denounce the Holocaust in an interview with CNN (full video below).

Guest

article_metadata.description: Iranian President Hassan Rouhani tells The Washington Post he wants a deal on Iran's nuclear program within six months. Meantime, he sparked outrage in Iran over his interview with CNN.
